explains: adj. 魁梧的，高大健壮的
n. 橡皮膏；皮带，捆扎带
v. （用带子）捆扎（strap 的现在分词）
wordGroup: strapping machine 打包机，捆扎机；带卷捆扎机

sentences.en: He was a bricklayer – a big, strapping fellow.
sentences.cn: 他是个砌砖工—一个高大健壮的年轻人。

sentences.en: He was a big strapping guy but short on brains.
sentences.cn: 他五大三粗，但头脑简单。

sentences.en: The messenger bent and scratched at his knee where the strapping chafed.
sentences.cn: 信使弯身挠膝盖上被带子擦痛的地方。
